description: This file defines a React component for a login page, handling user authentication via a backend API and managing navigation upon login.

methods.name: Login()
methods.description: React functional component for user login page, managing form state, handling submission, and integrating with authentication context.

methods.name: handleChange
methods.description: Updates form state based on user input.

methods.name: handleSubmit
methods.description: Handles form submission, performs login via context, and navigates on success.
